SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.entities

Class Mob

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.Mob
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, CyberGoblin, Glitched, JetBat, JunkSlime, MechaRat
public abstract class Mob extends CombatEntity
Represents a mob in the game.
Mobs are entities that can be attacked and defeated by the player.
See Also:
  • CombatEntity
  • MobAttack

  • Constructor Details

    • Mob

      protected Mob(int hp, int atk, int def, int diceFaces, int lvl, int xpDrop, int moneyDrop, Coordinates position)
      Constructor for the Mob class with a random drop
      Parameters:
      hp - The mob's health points
      atk - The mob's attack points
      def - The mob's defense points
      diceFaces - The number of faces on the mob's dice
      lvl - The mob's level
      xpDrop - The amount of experience points the mob drops when defeated
      moneyDrop - The amount of money the mob drops when defeated
      position - The mob's position
      See Also:
      • Entity
      • CombatEntity

    • Mob

      lvl - The mob's level
